title: Part 1: Holgorsen Talks About Upcoming Opener With Georgia Southern
content:
Stonewall Jackson Junior High Auditorium. 

Charleston police are hosting a West Side community meeting at 6 p.m. Thursday, Feb. 26, at Stonewall Jackson Junior High Auditorium. 

Police said they will discuss public safety concerns and police/community partnerships with West Side residents and businesses, according to a news release from the Charleston Police Department. 

No particular incident has prompted the meeting. Police said the main purpose is to hear concerns and share information.
